title: "New hardware architecture provides an edge in AI computation"
excerpt: "Shifting some computation from geographically distant data centers back to AI chips on a local device promises to overcome the frustration of lag and delay. A new hardware architecture making use of hafnium-oxide ferroelectrics for the emerging concept of physical reservoir computing should allow much more of such computation shifting,"
